channel.title: Release Notes on TravelgateX Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Roadmap
Changelog
item.description: To make it easier for users and contributors to see precisely what notable changes have been made on TravelgateX. All notable changes on TravelgateX platform will be documented in this page. Under construction! We have logged this resource on our roadmap and we are currently working through extending all of the resources in our documentation. If you need specific resources (such as this page), please let us know by using one of the following channels:

item.title: GraphQL Schema Changes
item.description: The GraphQL schema change log is a list of recent and upcoming changes to our GraphQL API schema. It includes backwards-compatible changes, schema previews, and upcoming breaking changes. Check out this list of new releases and changes applied on the TravelgateX GraphQL API. 2018-06-21 ðŸ›‘ Field group was removed from object type PointOfSaleData âœ… Field Stats.statsData description changed from `GUID The data returned by a `Stats` query.toGUID The data returned by a Stats query.

item.title: Deprecated Schema Notes
item.description: Changes that can break existing queries to the GraphQL API. For example, removing a field would be a breaking change Deprecation date Deletion date Days left Name Location Deprecation Reason 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed hotel Booking You can find it in query at HotelX 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed booking Query You can find it in query at HotelX 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed hotel Quote You can find it in query at HotelX 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed hotel Search You can find it in query at HotelX 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed createDefaultSettings Mutation You can find it in query at Admin 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed loadFile Mutation You can find it in query at Admin 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed search Query You can find it in query at HotelX 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed quote Query You can find it in query at HotelX 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed deleteDefaultSettings Mutation You can find it in query at Admin 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed defaultSettings Query You can find it in query at HotelX 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed mapping Query You can find it in query at HotelX 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed hotelBook Mutation You can find it in query at HotelX 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed hotelCancel Mutation You can find it in query at HotelX 2017-11-21 2018-02-19 Already passed updateDefaultSettings Mutation You can find it in query at Admin 2017-12-12 2018-03-12 Already passed useContext HotelSettingsInput Redundant.

item.title: Deleted Schema Notes
item.description: Changes history of deprecated notes previously announced Under construction! We have logged this resource on our roadmap and we are currently working through extending all of the resources in our documentation. If you need specific resources (such as this page), please let us know by using one of the following channels: Join us on Slack and let us know what resources you need us to prirotize Send us a Jira service desk request Log an issues request with us Write this page yourself!
